name: Grimoire Finance Token
additional_notices: No active trades are found for this coin. Please submit a ticket at %{link} if you think this is an error.

description.en: Grimoire Finance is a Decentralized Trading (spot & futures)Exchange and Yield Farming Protocol launching on the Fantom Opera network and later on Arbitrum Network. As a trading platform  we're invested in developing a strong foundation with our Grimoire token (GRIM) as a DAO token, along with several farms, pools, and a unique deflationary protocol with an amazing APR called Grimoire Potions.
